org.sakaiproject.shortenedurl.api

Interface ShortenedUrlService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseShortenedUrlService, BitlyUrlService, NoOpUrlService, RandomisedUrlService

    public interface ShortenedUrlService
    This is the base service which all URL shortening services must implement You can specify the URL shortening scheme in sakai.properties
    Author:
    Steve Swinsburg (s.swinsburg@gmail.com)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String DEFAULT_IMPLEMENTATION
      The default implementation of this service as a Spring bean reference
      static String EVENT_CREATE_COLLISION
      Event fired if a shortened URL is created but it collides with an existing one for a different URL
      static String EVENT_CREATE_EXISTS
      Event fired if a shortened URL is requested to be created, but one for this URL already exists
      static String EVENT_CREATE_OK
      Event fired if shortened URL is created ok
      static String EVENT_GET_URL_BAD
      Event fired if URL does not exist
      static String EVENT_GET_URL_OK
      Event fired if URL translation is ok
      static String IMPLEMENTATION_PROP_NAME
      The name of the property in sakai.properties.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String resolve(String key)
      Provide an implementation of this to get the original URL for the given shortened URL.
      String shorten(String url)
      Provide an implementation of this which generates a shortened URL given some other URL
      String shorten(String url, boolean secure)
      Provide an implementation of this which generates a shortened URL given some other URL.

    • Method Detail

      • shorten

        String shorten(String url)
        Provide an implementation of this which generates a shortened URL given some other URL
        Parameters:
        url -
        Returns:
        the full shortened URL

      • shorten

        String shorten(String url,
             boolean secure)
        Provide an implementation of this which generates a shortened URL given some other URL.

        This method also provides an optional flag which you can use to make your URL more secure.

        Parameters:
        url -
        Returns:
        the full shortened URL

      • resolve

        String resolve(String key)
        Provide an implementation of this to get the original URL for the given shortened URL.
        Parameters:
        key - - the shortened key
        Returns:
        the original URL that maps to this key
